Apple___Apple_scab.symptoms: Dark, scabby lesions on leaves and fruit, olive-green spots
organic_treatment: Remove fallen leaves and infected fruit
Apply sulfur spray during growing season
chemical_treatment: Apply at bud break and continue every 7-10 days

Apple___Black_rot.symptoms: Black, sunken lesions on fruit and shoots, frogeye leaf spot
organic_treatment: Improve tree vigor with proper nutrition
chemical_treatment: Apply during pink and petal fall stages

Apple___Cedar_apple_rust.symptoms: Yellow-orange spots on leaves with tube-like projections underneath
chemical_treatment: Apply at pink bud stage and continue
prevention: Remove juniper within 100 yards if possible

Apple___healthy.symptoms: Healthy green foliage, no lesions or spots
prevention: Regular monitoring for early disease detection
